title: Hi, my boards account say that i was gold last season.
body:
Can someone from the moderation fix that to my actual history of elos?

https://imgur.com/a/gSlNz

replies.body: The boards ranked flair thing is buggy, my season2 gold is missing for no reason. Good luck getting yours fixed though!

Yeah, but in my case even op.gg, lol king and etc is saying that I started playing ranked last year and I finished it gold.

I have elos across all years since season 3!

It's like someone made up that I was gold and erased everything I ever did.

I'm not entirely sure what you're asking here, but I'm assuming you're thinking you've missed an icon somewhere? I double checked your rank from last season and it looks like you did finish as Gold 1.

I posted all my icons from my account. I was diamond 4 last season. Those prints are from my account right now.

Also I'm right now using a challenger 2014 icon. If I only played last season and I was gold, how I'm suppose to have that?

Please check with some other rioters what is going on! Please.

Edit:
Also thanks for answering!

Edit:
I'm not talking about missing an icon, I'm using my icons to prove that riot have the wrong data about my account. On my boards account it show like I was gold. Also it show on op.gg and everywhere.

The point is that I want it fixed to my actual elos I had! I never finished a season gold and people are judging me because of what they see in the system.

Ah! That was honestly my bad >_<!!!

I apologize, I was actually looking at the rank that you ended at when the ranked queues stopped ranking you. As it turns out, that was *NOT* the rank you ended the *season* at (the system keeps tracking your progress even after the season if officially over). Again, apologies for having read that wrong.

I went back in and double-checked and you're right, you did end at Diamond 4 last season (uuuuh GRATS first of all). After that I did some digging to find what icon you should have gotten for placing there, and lo and behold you already had it! In your third picture, the fourth icon over is the D4 icon.

Here's a handy lil' pic for reference when you're hunting through that list of icons. (You'll probabaly want to zoom in on that pic a bit)
https://i.gyazo.com/f71f75f47818abb92334e41a650f5037.png

Here is an example of how many icons are suppose to be displayed instead of what is displaying in my case:
https://imgur.com/a/cXEqn

Thank you again for you attention but my problem is not about finding an icon from last season. Is about the system displaying that i was gold last season and that i never played before it. ( I never, ever finished a season gold and I play since season 3)

https://imgur.com/a/0i87h

Check the image above. 
Also you will see that through my icons i have other diamond icons from other seasons. Also i have a challenger icon and a silver icon [silver from season 3].

All that is not displayed and is treated like never existed.
Now do you think my issue is more clear?

You can see through my icons my previous elos.
Can you just fix that?
